subject: Refugees and Displaced Persons
lead_paragraph: Unable to practice in Port-au-Prince since the Jan. 12 earthquake that killed up to 250,000 people, the Haitian team is staying in Texas until its May 5 game against Argentina.
snippet: Unable to practice in Port-au-Prince since the Jan. 12 earthquake that killed up to 250,000 people, the Haitian team is staying in Texas until its May 5 game against Argentina.
